BLOCK.QRY: UPDATE EST_SERVICE_AGENCY_MST SET STR_AGENCY_NAME=?,STR_AGENCY_ADDRESS=?,STR_CONTACT_PERSON=?,STR_TELEPHONE_NUMBER=?, GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM=TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY'),GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO=TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY'),GSTR_REMARKS=?,GNUM_ISVALID=? WHERE NUM_SERVICE_AGENCY_ID=? AND GNUM_SLNO=? AND NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

UPDATE EST_SERVICE_AGENCY_MST SET STR_AGENCY_NAME=?,STR_AGENCY_ADDRESS=?,STR_CONTACT_PERSON=?,STR_TELEPHONE_NUMBER=?, GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM=?, GSTR_REMARKS=?,GNUM_ISVALID=? WHERE NUM_SERVICE_AGENCY_ID=? AND GNUM_SLNO=? AND NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE EST_SERVICE_AGENCY_MST T SET T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?, T.GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE T.NUM_SERVICE_AGENCY_ID=? AND T.GNUM_SLNO=? AND T.NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE EST_SERVICE_AGENCY_MST T SET T.GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO=(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')-1) WHERE T.NUM_SERVICE_AGENCY_ID=? AND T.GNUM_SLNO=? AND T.NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE EST_SERVICE_AGENCY_MST T SET T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.NUM_SERVICE_AGENCY_ID=? AND T.GNUM_SLNO=? AND T.NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE EST_SERVICE_AGENCY_MST T SET T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.NUM_SERVICE_AGENCY_ID=? AND T.GNUM_SLNO=? AND T.NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
